#<img loading="lazy" id="dimg_16" class="rISBZc M4dUYb" style="font-size: 16px;" title="http://google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=Warren Buffett" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Image result for Warren Buffett" width="139" height="186" data-atf="3" /> 

# Concluded Myers Briggs Personality Type &#8211;&nbsp;

# [ISTJ &#8220;Practical and fact-minded individual&#8221;](https://www.afriqueunique.org/portrait-of-an-istj-introverted-sensing-thinking-judging-introverted-sensing-with-extraverted-thinking/)

## Net Worth: **$84 billion &#8211; 2018**
